Docs.summary: Specifies a file upload destination within an Azure blob storage container.

MemberSignature.Value: public OutputFileBlobContainerDestination (string containerUrl, string path = null);

Docs.param: The URL of the container within Azure Blob Storage to which to upload the file(s).
The destination blob or virtual directory within the Azure Storage container to which to upload the file(s).
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContainerUrl As String
public: property System::String ^ ContainerUrl { System::String ^ get(); };
public: property Platform::String ^ ContainerUrl { Platform::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the URL of the container within Azure Blob Storage to which to upload the file(s).
Docs.remarks: The URL must include a Shared Access Signature (SAS) granting write permissions to the container.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Path As String
public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); };
public: property Platform::String ^ Path { Platform::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the destination blob or virtual directory within the Azure Storage container to which to upload the file(s).

remarks.para: If refers to a specific file (i.e. it contains no wildcards), then this is the name of the blob to which to upload that file.
If contains wildcards (and may therefore match multiple files), then this then this is the name of the blob virtual directory (which is prepended to each blob name) to which to upload the file(s).
If omitted, file(s) are uploaded to the root of the container with a blob name matching their file name.
